title: ExCALIBUR Fusion Modelling System: Complementary actions and internal work
summary: This report describes work for ExCALIBUR project NEPTUNE at Milestone M7c.3. It outlines complementary actions to assist code-coupling, benchmarking techniques and physics databases. The work includes the development of educational material, technical material, text processing tools, improvements to the developers’ website, and benchmarking aimed at helping optimize NESO execution.
